column6:
A massive alien refugee fleet streams through our solar system, bearing the warning: "Galactus is coming! Galactus is coming!" And right behind them is the World-Devourer's herald, the SILVER SURFER -- headed straight for Earth! Reed Richards has only a few days to evacuate the planet before it's destroyed ... or, failing that, figure out a way to somehow stop the unstoppable!,2007,7

32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.99
column7: | Fantastic Four | Human Torch | Invisible Woman | Mr. Fantastic | Silver Surfer | Thing
column8: | penciller:Cory Hamscher | colorist:Lee Loughridge | letterer:Dave Sharpe | penciller (cover):Paul Smith | writer:Fred Van Lente
